GLOBAL_INSTRUCTIONS.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL_INSTRUCTIONS.instruction: Fill the form in BLACK INK and CAPITAL LETTERS only.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters

APP_DATE.title: Date of Application
APP_DATE.instruction: Enter today's date in DD-MM-YYYY format.

CUST_DETAILS.title: Customer Details
CUST_DETAILS.instruction: Enter your Customer ID and full Name as per bank records.

IDENTITY_DOCS.title: Identity Documents
IDENTITY_DOCS.instruction:
Enter your Aadhaar Number and PAN. 
Note: If you only submit PAN, you must also provide an additional address proof.
rejections: Only PAN provided without address proof

PHOTO_SIGN.title: Photograph & Signature
PHOTO_SIGN.instruction: Paste a recent colour photograph in the box and sign across it.

CHANGE_PERM_ADDRESS.title: Change Permanent Address
CHANGE_PERM_ADDRESS.instruction: Tick this box ONLY if you want to change your permanent address. You must attach an Officially Valid Document (OVD) like Passport or Voter ID as proof.
rejections: Selected but no OVD proof attached
Selected but new address details missing

PERM_ADDRESS_DETAILS.title: New Permanent Address
PERM_ADDRESS_DETAILS.instruction: If changing address, write the new Line 1, Line 2, City, State, and Pin Code.
rejections: Address incomplete (Pin code or City missing)

CHANGE_MAIL_ADDRESS.title: Change Mailing Address
CHANGE_MAIL_ADDRESS.instruction: Tick this box to change where your bank letters are sent. You can select 'Same as Above' if it matches your permanent address.

MAIL_ADDRESS_TYPE.title: Mailing Address Type
MAIL_ADDRESS_TYPE.instruction: Select if this address is your 'Residence' or 'Place of Work'.
rejections: Mailing address changed but type not selected

NO_CHANGE_DECLARATION.title: No Change Declaration
NO_CHANGE_DECLARATION.instruction: Tick this box if your details have NOT changed and you are just updating your KYC status.
rejections: Ticked while other change sections are filled

OCCUPATION_DETAILS.title: Occupation & Income
OCCUPATION_DETAILS.instruction: Tick your Occupation (e.g., Salaried, Self-Employed), Source of Income, and Gross Annual Income.

FATCA_DETAILS.title: FATCA / Tax Residency
FATCA_DETAILS.instruction:
Enter your Place and Country of Birth. 
If you pay tax in any country other than India, you MUST fill the Country of Tax Residence and TIN.
rejections: Tax resident of foreign country declared but TIN missing

FINAL_DECLARATION.title: Customer Signature
FINAL_DECLARATION.instruction: Sign at the bottom to certify that all information is true.

BANK_USE_ONLY.title: For Bank Use Only
BANK_USE_ONLY.instruction: To be completed by bank staff for service request number, branch details, and verification.

DOCUMENTS_REQUIRED.title: Supporting Documents
DOCUMENTS_REQUIRED.instruction: PAN/Form 60, photo identity proof, address proof, income proof, and business proof (where applicable) must be submitted. Requirements may vary by scheme.
